text: Gei goodou gi daaligidia gii mmade nia daangada haga donu midi, be go nia soukohp ala e dagi goodou gi hai baahi gi Dimaadua, dela ne daa goodou gi daha mo Egypt, di gowaa nogo hagaduadua ai goodou. Nia daangada ala e hai beelaa, le e hai di huaidu, e hiihai e dagi goodou gi daha mo di mouli o Dimaadua dela ne hagi adu gi goodou bolo gi mouli ai. Digaula le e hai loo gi daaligi gii mmade, gii mmaa nia huaidu gi daha mo goodou.
